Class TestMatchingQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • movieDBquiz.TestMatchingQuestion

  • public class TestMatchingQuestion
extends java.lang.Object
    Tests all methods in the MatchingQuestion Class.
    Version:
    1.0 Summer 2017
    Author:
    David Bizzocchi, Josh Aitken, Caitlin Heyn

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void testAddAnswerTitleNull()
      Tests that an error is thrown when the movie title is given an invalid null argument.
      void testAddAnswerTitleValid()
      Tests if a title is successfully added into the ArrayList of possible Answers.
      void testAddAnswerTitleWhiteSpace()
      Tests that an error is thrown when the movie title is given an invalid whitespace argument.
      void testConstructor()
      Tests if the constructor has successfully instantiated.
      void testCorrectAnserIndexNeg()
      Test that an error is thrown when negative index is set for the correct answer.
      void testCorrectAnswerBoolean()
      Test that the correct answer can be set appropriately.
      void testCorrectAnswerIndexLarge()
      Test that an error is thrown when too large of a an index is set for the correct answer.
      void testCorrectAnswerValid()
      Test that setting the index of the answer to a valid number is correct.
      void testGenerateMatchingQuestion()
      Tests that a question and answers are generated.
      void testGetMovieList()
      Tests that the populated movie list is retrievable.
      void testGetPossibleAnswers()
      Tests that the array list of answers for the current question has exactly 4 answers.
      void testToString()
      Tests that the toString is not an empty string.
